name: This Could've Been A Game
description:
Submission 1/7 for GameDesign Core Module 2 - for my school.

Theme: "Giant Hangover" 

Limited Genre: "Platformer where obstacles help you"

You're drunk & dizzy.  Everything is spinning.
Touching platforms will make it stop -briefly. Use "Space" to jump. Make your way to the top.

Press 'Esc' to quit.
